name: Star Surveyor
description:
Star Surveyor is an exploration game about discovering a foreign planet, and observing the lives of its alien inhabitants.
You're sent to Maya-247 with a simple mission: use your scanner to gather data about all of the flora and fauna you can, and send that data back to Earth.
Along the way you'll unlock upgrades to your suit which allow you to delve deeper under the planet's surface.


  • A hand-crafted world
  • 5 different biomes that are home to their own unique creatures
  • A host of suit upgrades that allow you to explore your environment in different ways
  • Creatures that require observation and patience to scan
  • Frogs
